title: 香港01 呢份工幾錢人工?

replies.msg:
香港01－Senior Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Build and maintain high availability and horizontal scalable applications.
Keep delivering backend codes with high quality.
Unit-testing code including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
Continuously discover, evaluate and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.



Requirements:

Love learning and sharing new technical knowledge.
Good team player. Not hater. Wish to grow and success together.
Possess a strong sense of ownership.
Willing to take new challenges.
Adaptive to change.
Advanced on either PHP, Node.js, Python, Golang. etc
Knowledge in any modern MVC framework is a must.
Experience in API design.
Good in RDBMS, NoSQL, Message Queue are preferred.
Experience in cloud services (AWS, MS Azure, Google App Engine. etc) is a must.
2+ years relevant working experience.
Relevant higher diploma / degree is NOT a must.





Attractive remuneration with 5-day work week will be offered in commensurate with qualifications and experience. Interested parties, please apply together with a detailed resume, stating current and expected salary, and send it via APPLY NOW.

All personal information collected will be treated in strict confidence for employment purpose only. Your application can be considered as unsuccessful if you have not been reached within 3 months. On the other hand, it may be transferred to other companies of our group for job openings. Unsuccessful applications will be destroyed for a period not more than 12 months.
Additional Information
Career Level
Entry Level
Qualification
Not Specified
Industry
Media / Publishing / Printing
Job Function
Information Technology (IT) > Application Specialist - Software, Information Technology (IT) > Software Development, Information Technology (IT) > Mobile / Wireless Communications
Years of Experience
Not Specified
Employment Type
Full Time
Benefits
Dental insurance, Five-day work week, Free shuttle bus, Medical insurance
Company Website
https://www.hk01.com
Hk01前排先炒完人
咁高，見之前個個係死ＭＫ仔黎ｊａｉ　ｗｏｒ

包埋冚家剷 做唔做?

HK01 流失率高到你唔信
